accept_neutral: t_c thanks you for your gift (y_g).
accept_dislike: t_c takes your gift (y_g) with a frown.
already_have: t_c thanks you, but {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} already {VERB/t_c/have/has} the accessory you've given {PRONOUN/t_c/object} (y_g).

accept_neutral: t_c accepts your gift (y_g) with a polite thank you.

STICK.accept_dislike: t_c wonders why you've gifted them such a mundane accessory. Do you think that they are Jayfeather from the elders' tales?

LARGE DEATHBERRY.accept_like: t_c takes the accessory with a glint in their eyes. Perhaps this gift can be useful.

SMALL DEATHBERRY.accept_like: t_c takes the accessory with a glint in their eyes. Perhaps this gift can be useful.

RAINBOWBOW.accept_like: t_c thanks you and takes the colourful bow with a smile!
RAINBOWBOW.accept_dislike: t_c eyes you strangely and stuffs the bow under {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} nest before anycat can see it.
